errors.name: NoMintsInTable
errors.msg: There are no mints in the table

errors.name: NoVaultsInRegistry
errors.msg: There are no vaults in the registry

errors.name: VaultNotInRegistry
errors.msg: Vault not in weight table registry

errors.name: MintInTable
errors.msg: Mint is already in the table

errors.name: WeightMintsDoNotMatchLength
errors.msg: Weight mints do not match - length

errors.name: WeightMintsDoNotMatchMintHash
errors.msg: Weight mints do not match - mint hash

errors.name: ConfigMintsNotUpdated
errors.msg: Config supported mints do not match NCN Vault Count

errors.name: ConfigMintListFull
errors.msg: NCN config vaults are at capacity

errors.name: VaultRegistryListFull
errors.msg: Vault Registry mints are at capacity

errors.name: VaultRegistryVaultLocked
errors.msg: Vault registry are locked for the epoch

errors.name: VaultIndexAlreadyInUse
errors.msg: Vault index already in use by a different mint

errors.name: VaultOperatorDelegationFinalized
errors.msg: Vault operator delegation is already finalized - should not happen

errors.name: OperatorFinalized
errors.msg: Operator is already finalized - should not happen

errors.name: ConsensusAlreadyReached
errors.msg: Consensus already reached, cannot change vote

errors.name: VotingNotValid
errors.msg: Voting not valid, too many slots after consensus reached

errors.name: TieBreakerNotInPriorVotes
errors.msg: Tie breaking ballot must be one of the prior votes

errors.name: InvalidOperatorVoter
errors.msg: Operator voter needs to sign its vote

errors.name: InvalidNcnFeeGroup
errors.msg: Not a valid NCN fee group

errors.name: InvalidBaseFeeGroup
errors.msg: Not a valid base fee group

errors.name: NoFeedWeightOrSwitchboardFeed
errors.msg: Weight entry needs either a feed or a no feed weight

errors.name: InvalidEpochsBeforeClose
errors.msg: Invalid epochs before accounts can close

errors.name: VotingIsNotOver
errors.msg: Cannot route until voting is over

errors.name: CannotCloseAccountNotEnoughEpochs
errors.msg: Cannot close account - Not enough epochs have passed since consensus reached

errors.name: CannotCloseAccountNoReceiverProvided
errors.msg: Cannot close account - No receiver provided

errors.name: CannotCloseEpochStateAccount
errors.msg: Cannot close epoch state account - Epoch state needs all other accounts to be closed first
